title: 3430 Sharon Ln, Alton, IL 62002
description:
New 2026 Champion / Dutch Home now on the market! 
Get a brand-new energy efficient home at a fraction of the cost of a nearby residential home. Modern spacious kitchen with island, all stainless-steel new appliances. Wooded lot with spectacular views. Rapid Wall premium insulated skirting all along the bottom for energy efficiency and even lower utility bills. This is a high quality all drywall Dutch home on a beautiful, secluded lot. There are no property taxes for this home. Close to shopping district in a peaceful and beautiful country setting.
